SEARCH:
程序包 Controller.bank

类 HistoryController

java.lang.Object
Controller.bank.HistoryController
public class HistoryController extends Object
The HistoryController class manages the interaction between the GUI and the data model for the transaction history of a kid. It handles user actions such as selecting a date to view transactions and refreshing the transaction display.
